name: Purgatory (itch) (papindra)
description:
Welcome to Purgatory.

You will have to survive 12 fights in order to avoid the worst.

On your way, you will confront dangerous, powerful, horryfing and sad(?) enemies, who will have no mercy on you and your time, spent to defeat them. 

or maybe you will beat the game like nothing and say at the end "what the hell was even that"
